summary: Three short films, one each from Directors Michelangelo Antonioni, Steven Soderbergh, and Wong Kar Wai, address the themes of love and sex.
cast: Li Gong|Chen Chang|Feng Tien|Chun-Luk Chan|Jianjun Zhou|Wing Tong Sheung|Kim Tak Wong|Siu Man Ting|Lai Fu Yim|Cheng You Shin|Wing Kong Siu|Kar Fai Lee|Chi Keong Un|Robert Downey Jr.|Alan Arkin|Ele Keats|Christopher Buchholz|Regina Nemni|Luisa Ranieri|Cecilia Luci|Karima Machehour|Riccardo Manfredi|Valerio Burroni|Pelino Tarantelli|Maria Bosio|Carla Milani|Vinicio Milani|Ugo Quattrini|Jason Cardone|Carin Berger|Enrica Antonioni
director: Directors: Michelangelo Antonioni, Steven Soderbergh | 1 more credit »
title: Eros
